```{r}
mydata <- mydata %>% mutate(Elite = case_when(mydata$Top10perc > 50 ~ "Yes",
                                   TRUE ~ "No"))
# View(mydata)  # 78 Elite
```

```{r}
# code chunk here

        data=mydata,
        xlab="Elite",
        ylab="Outstate")
```
